verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> on Neginoth <WH5058>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. Hear <WH6030> <WH8798> me when I call <WH7121> <WH8800>, O 'Elohim <WH430> of my righteousness <WH6664>: thou hast enlarged <WH7337> <WH8689> me when I was in distress <WH6862>; have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me, and hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my prayer <WH8605>.

O ye sons <WH1121> of men <WH376>, how long <WH5704> will ye turn my glory <WH3519> into shame <WH3639>? how long will ye love <WH157> <WH8799> vanity <WH7385>, and seek <WH1245> <WH8762> after leasing <WH3577>? Selah <WH5542>.

But know <WH3045> <WH8798> that the YY <WH3068> hath set apart <WH6395> <WH8689> him that is godly <WH2623> for himself: the YY <WH3068> will hear <WH8085> <WH8799> when I call <WH7121> <WH8800> unto him.
Stand in awe <WH7264> <WH8798>, and sin <WH2398> <WH8799> not: commune <WH559> <WH8798> with your own heart <WH3824> upon your bed <WH4904>, and be still <WH1826> <WH8798>. Selah <WH5542>.
Offer <WH2076> <WH8798> the sacrifices <WH2077> of righteousness <WH6664>, and put your trust <WH982> <WH8798> in the YY <WH3068>.

There be many <WH7227> that say <WH559> <WH8802>, Who will shew <WH7200> <WH8686> us any good <WH2896>? YY <WH3068>, lift thou up <WH5375> <WH8798> the light <WH216> of thy countenance <WH6440> upon us.
Thou hast put <WH5414> <WH8804> gladness <WH8057> in my heart <WH3820>, more than in the time <WH6256> that their corn <WH1715> and their wine <WH8492> increased <WH7231> <WH8804>.
I will both <WH3162> lay me down <WH7901> <WH8799> in peace <WH7965>, and sleep <WH3462> <WH8799>: for thou, YY <WH3068>, only <WH910> makest me dwell <WH3427> <WH8686> in safety <WH983>.
